introParagraph: Embark on a journey through my digital craftsmanship, where technology meets creativity. Below are the realms of my expertise:

cards.title: Front-End Development
cards.description: Specializing in creating responsive and engaging user interfaces with JavaScript, React, and SvelteKit.

cards.title: Back-End Development
cards.description: Expertise in NodeJS and Python to build efficient, scalable server-side applications for diverse needs.

cards.title: API Development & Integration
cards.description: Developing and integrating custom APIs to enhance and streamline web application functionalities.

cards.title: Database Management
cards.description: Designing and optimizing databases to elevate your data systems for peak efficiency and performance.

cards.title: Responsive Web Design
cards.description: Designing visually appealing and functional websites that provide a seamless experience across all devices.

cards.title: Version Control & Project Management
cards.description: Utilizing Git and Jira for effective project management, ensuring smooth team collaboration.
